Title: Relates to the issuance of retirement service identification cards to auxiliary police officers
Summary: Directs local law enforcement agencies in municipalities authorizing an auxiliary police force by local law to provide retirement service identification cards to auxiliary police officers who retire with 10 or more years of service or who are injured in the course of duty and unable to continue duty due to such injury.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to the issuance of retirement service identification cards to auxiliary police officers
